alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Dooly; Houston; Laurens; Pulaski; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 2:52AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southern Wilkinson, northwestern Dodge, Pulaski, Twiggs, Dooly, Bleckley and southern Houston Counties through 315 AM EST... At 252 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Myricks Mill to near Kathleen to Dooling, and moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Hawkinsville, Vienna, Jeffersonville, Unadilla, Dudley, Byromville, Pinehurst, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Dooling, Marion, Hayneville, Mobley Crossing, Mock Springs, District Path, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Paulk and Yonkers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bleckley; Dodge; Dooly; Houston; Laurens; Pulaski; Twiggs; Wilkinson
